mapper.select: select qu.id, qu.name, q.id as qid, q.name as qname, o.id as oid, o.name as oname from ec1_interaction qu, ec1_interaction_type q, ec1_interaction_ask o, ec1_interaction_ec1_interaction_type_c qc, ec1_interaction_type_ec1_interaction_ask_c oc where qc.ec1_interaction_ec1_interaction_typeec1_interaction_ida = qu.id and qc.ec1_interaction_ec1_interaction_typeec1_interaction_type_idb = q.id and oc.ec1_interaction_type_ec1_interaction_askec1_interaction_type_ida = q.id and oc.ec1_interaction_type_ec1_interaction_askec1_interaction_ask_idb = o.id and qu.deleted = false and q.deleted = false and o.deleted = false and qc.deleted = false and oc.deleted = false and qu.id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.sql: id, name, date_entered, date_modified, modified_user_id, created_by, deleted, assigned_user_id, int_st_dt, int_ed_dt, int_st

mapper.update:
update ec1_interaction
name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
date_entered = #{dateEntered,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
date_modified = #{dateModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modified_user_id = #{modifiedUserId,jdbcType=CHAR},
created_by = #{createdBy,jdbcType=CHAR},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=BIT},
assigned_user_id = #{assignedUserId,jdbcType=CHAR},
int_st_dt = #{intStDt,jdbcType=DATE},
int_ed_dt = #{intEdDt,jdbcType=DATE},
int_st = #{intSt,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
description = #{description,jdbcType=LONGVARCHAR},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
